title: High Marks for Murder
description: Meet Headmistress--and sometime sleuth--Meredith Llewellyn of Bellehaven House, a finishing school for girls.It's the height of elegance, the seat of sophistication, the scene ofâ€¦murder?Teacher Kathleen Duncan was killed in the school garden at night. Judging by a bloody branch, Miss Meredith Llewellyn assumes it was an accident, until she learns that the limb didn't break off--it was neatly sawn. But as she searches for a killer, Meredith wonders if her eyes are playing tricks on her. How else can she explain her foggy images of Kathleen pointing to the flowerbeds? Without the help of the lazy constable or her petrified teachers, Meredith will have to find a link between flowers and the killing, take heed of her own safety, and get an education--in murder.
author: Rebecca Kent
